participant_1.background:
I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest and saw a sloth in the wild.
i work in finance.
i recently had a private lunch with will ferrell.
i had one step dad , and fortunately he ignored me.

participant_2.background:
I would love to learn how to play the guitar like the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
I am a good welder and have a knack for making new friends.
I have a rocking chair that I like to sit in while reading to my children.
I want to sell my paintings to make money.

content.text: I would like to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
I could help you with that. I am a good welder and have a knack for making new friends.
That would be great. I have a lot of ideas, but I need to get the word out.
I am sure we can work together to come up with a plan. What kind of neighborhood is it?
It is a middle class neighborhood. There are a lot of families with young children.
That is perfect. We could put up flyers in the neighborhood. I can also make some signs for your storefront.
That would be great. I would also like to get the word out on social media.
I can help with that too. I am pretty good with social media marketing.
That is great. I really appreciate your help.
No problem. I am happy to help. I have a feeling this juicing bar is going to be a big success.
I hope so. I have been working on this project for a long time. I am excited to finally be able to open it.
I am sure it will be great. I can see you doing well with this.
You are welcome. I am always happy to help a friend.
